title: Dye Trader
summaries: The Dye Trader is an NPC vendor who sells the Dye Vat and other dye-related items. He will move in when the following criteria have been met:

• There is an available vacant house.
  • (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) The player has a dye, dye ingredient, or Strange Plant in their inventory, and at least four other town NPCs are in the world. Note that while the Old Man, Traveling Merchant, and town pets count towards this total, the Skeleton Merchant does not.
  • (Old-gen console version) The player has a dye or dye ingredient in their inventory.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, these requirements only apply to the initial spawning. If the Dye Trader is killed, he will automatically respawn after some time.

(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) In addition to selling dye-related items, players may trade in Strange Plants for uncraftable and unpurchasable animated dyes once Hardmode has been reached. These dyes are given at random in sets of 6 for each exchanged Strange Plant.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Dye Trader will attack nearby enemies with his Exotic Scimitar to defend himself, dealing 11 / 16 / 19 damage at the start of the game, and as players progress he will gain various stat increases. The Dye Trader also has a 1/8 (12.5%) chance of dropping the Exotic Scimitar upon death.

statistics.Damage: 111619 (Exotic Scimitar)
